SGBotic:
SGBotic blocks

I2C LCD package for microbit Makecode.
This package is based on library by microbit-makecode-packages
SGBotic.ShowNumber:
Print number from position defined by row and column.
Decimal numbers are not supported.
SGBotic.ShowNumber|param|n: is number to be printed, eg: 10, 100, 200
SGBotic.ShowString: Print string from position defined by row and column.
SGBotic.ShowString|param|s: is string to be printed, eg: "Hello"
SGBotic.home: Move cursor to row 0 and column 0
SGBotic.initLCD: Configure LCD and set the I2C address
